https://tmrev.io/movie/30445-Christmas Nightmare 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null After witnessing the brutal assassination of presidential candidate Francis Mohan, a young married couple (Edward and Alice Anderson) are taken to a safe house miles from civilization. Upon their arrival at the safe house, the trio is shocked to find it abandoned and their stay takes a sudden turn for the worse. Their guardian begins undergoing dark and unsettling changes to his personality. Christmas Nightmare
